Configure Project/Workfile Attributes

Use the Configure Project dialog box (Admin | Configure Project | General Tab | Workfiles | Attributes) to set whether or not workfiles are deleted from their workfile locations after check in and whether or not workfiles left in their workfile locations are write-protected (read-only).

Field Descriptions

Workfiles | Attributes
After Check In Do one of the following:

Select Delete workfile to delete a workfile from the workfile location after check in.

Select Keep writable workfile to not delete the workfile from the workfile location after check in and to keep the file in write mode.

Select Keep read only workfile to not delete the workfile from the workfile location after check in and to make the file read only.

See Also

Setting Workfile Attributes Options Workfile Attributes Options
